content:
The figure below shows a cube of side length $6$.  

![cube vertical slice](https://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/294f9514eb8ff76c2ef01fa15cac104d58e65bc8.png)

**Drag the corners of the square below to draw the shape of a vertical slice through the cube.**   

Assume the slice is parallel to one of the faces of the cube.

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]]
